data.eml:eml: New species of zerconid mites from southern Europe and the Macaronesian region (Acari: Mesostigmata: Zerconidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moraza, María Lourdes (2006): New species of zerconid mites from southern Europe and the Macaronesian region (Acari: Mesostigmata: Zerconidae). Zootaxa 1255: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173074
